thumb.title: Halo flowers
thumb.text: One of my personal projects are my halo flowers that I created exclusively for this homepage in 3D.

page.subTitle: Halo flowers - Illustration Design in 3D
page.text: For fun I prepared a set of illustrated flowers in 3D with the Blender animation program which I love. It is one of my own projects that I created exclusively to improve my company image and homepage. I tried out many color and light combinations before I finally chose my favorite. I later used the same color combinations to prepare my logos, business cards, buttons, and other graphic materials presented on this homepage Graphics by Ã…sa.
